item.title: I only have regular xp! plz help
item.dc:creator: @ghostboy195 ghostboy195
item.description:
@ghostboy195 wrote:

ok, ok, slow down.
right click on client.java and click edit
then press Ctrl+F and enter if (FightType != 3) {

you should comeup with something like this:

if (FightType != 3) { TotalExp = (double)(4 * hitDiff);

change the four or whatever your number is to how much exp you want per hit
